segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is gross with all that water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like a bad plumbing nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the floor and cabinetsâ€” what a filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right in it, oblivious and getting her shoes wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, but now it'll probably get splashed too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy's on a stool rummaging in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knows how old those cookies are, covered in who-knows-what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, probably tracking dirt into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just unsanitary with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't make up for this indoor slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to eat anything from that counter now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's apron is bound to get soaked soon too.
segments.speaker: PAR
